decomp.semantics.uds¶

Module for containing representing UDS graphs

class decomp.semantics.uds.UDSAnnotation(annotation)¶

Class for representing Universal Decompositional Semantics annotation

Parameters

annotation (Dict[str, Dict[str, Any]]) – mapping from node ids or pairs of node ids separated by _ to attribute-value pairs; node ids must not contain _

classmethod from_json(json)¶

Load Universal Decompositional Semantics annotation from JSON

The format of the JSON passed to this class method must be:

{GRAPHID_1: {NODEID_1_1: {ATTRIBUTE_I: VALUE,
                          ATTRIBUTE_J: VALUE,
                          ...},
             ...},
 GRAPHID_2: {NODEID_2_1: {ATTRIBUTE_K: VALUE,
                          ATTRIBUTE_L: VALUE,
                          ...},
             ...},
 ...
}

Graph and node identifiers must match the graph and node identifiers of the predpatt graphs to which the annotations will be added

Parameters

json (Union[str, Textio]) – (path to) file containing annotations as JSON

Return type

UDSAnnotation

items()¶

Dictionary-like items generator for attributes

Yields node_attriutes for a node as well as the attributes for all edges that touch it

class decomp.semantics.uds.UDSCorpus(graphs, annotations=[])¶

Container for collection of Universal Decompositional Semantics graphs

Parameters

  • graphs (PredPattCorpus) – the predpatt graphs to associate the annotations with

  • annotations (List[UDSAnnotation]) – the annotations to associate with predpatt nodes; no annotations can be passed if a pure predpatt corpus is desired

add_annotation(annotation)¶

Add annotations to UDS graphs in the corpus

Parameters

annotation (UDSAnnotation) – the annotations to add to the graphs in the corpus

Return type

None

classmethod from_conll(corpus, annotations=[], name=None)¶

Load UDS graph corpus from CoNLL (dependencies) and JSON (annotations)

This method should only be used if the UDS corpus is being (re)built. Otherwise, loading the corpus from the JSON shipped with this package using UDSCorpus.from_json is suggested.

Parameters

  • corpus (Union[str, Textio]) – (path to) Universal Dependencies corpus in conllu format

  • annotations (List[Union[str, Textio]]) – (paths to) annotations in JSON

  • name (Optional[str]) – corpus name to be appended to the beginning of graph ids

Return type

UDSCorpus

classmethod from_json(json)¶

Load annotated UDS graph corpus (including annotations) from JSON

This is the suggested method for loading the UDS corpus.

Parameters

json (Union[str, Textio]) – file containing Universal Decompositional Semantics corpus in JSON format

Return type

UDSCorpus

to_json(outfile=None)¶

Serialize corpus to json

Parameters

outfile (Union[str, Textio, None]) – file to write corpus to

Return type

Optional[str]
